external_games.name: Princess of the Moon: Allure of the Midnight Kiss

name: Princess of the Moon: Allure of the Midnight Kiss
storyline:
Welcome, Princess of the Moon.

You arrived at a negotiation in a foreign country with remnants of the Middle Ages. Night has fallen by the time the negotiations end, and you wander into a palace as you follow the moon home... Suddenly, chosen by the Princess of the Moon, you are to choose the next King that will lead the three kingdoms--!?

Before the fated day, you are to live together with the prince for 3 months and take lessons to become a true princess. Furthermore, you have to perform a secret role to the princes on a night with a full moon...?!

Which prince are you going to choose?
summary: Otome mobile game by Abracadabra Inc.
